packages.name: Back Porch Automation
packages.description: Automation and alerts for the door and lights associated with the back porch.

packages.name: Bathroom Fan Automation
packages.description: Controls a bathroom exhaust fan based on the humidity level.

packages.name: Camera Automation
packages.description: Turns on/off the cameras and reminders based on modes and other devices.

packages.name: Christmas Tree Automation
packages.description: Turns the Christmas Tree on and off based on routines.

packages.name: Dishwasher Automation
packages.description: Updates the state of an Appliance Status device representing a dishwasher.

packages.name: Dog Alerts
packages.description: Alerts for chores related to the dogs.

packages.name: Front Porch Automation
packages.description: Automation and alerts for the door and lights associated with the front porch.

packages.name: Garage Light Automation
packages.description: Turns the garage light on and off based on the occupancy of the garage and the status of the doors.

packages.name: Glows Automation
packages.description: Triggers Alexa virtual buttons using various mechanisms.

packages.name: Guest Alerts
packages.description: Sends alerts when guests may have arrived or departed.

packages.name: Holiday Lights Automation
packages.description: Turns the holiday light on and off based on the time of day and mode.

packages.name: Laundry Room Automation
packages.description: Automation and alerts for the devices associated with the laundry room.

packages.name: Life360 Refresh
packages.description: Refreshes Life360 if presence sensors are inconsistent.

packages.name: Mode Automation
packages.description: Changes mode based on presence sensors and sleep sensors.

packages.name: Pantry Automation
packages.description: Turns the pantry light on/off based on motion.

packages.name: Person Automation
packages.description: Updates the status of a Person Status device using a presence sensor and a switch.

packages.name: Presence URLs
packages.description: Provides URLs to control the status of child presence sensor from an external source (e.g. Locative).

packages.name: Reboot Notification
packages.description: Sends a notification when the hub reboots.

packages.name: Roomba Automation
packages.description: Starts and stops the Roomba based on a schedule and presence.

packages.name: Sunlight Automation
packages.description: Updates a switch based on time of day and illuminance.

packages.name: Thermostat Automation
packages.description: Sets thermostats to home/away based on the mode.

packages.name: Trash Reminder
packages.description: Reminder to take out the trash on specific days.

packages.name: Weather Alerts
packages.description: Alerts for various weather conditions.

packages.name: Window Alerts
packages.description: Alerts for the windows.

packages.name: Alarm System Status
packages.description: Driver representing an alarm system with 3 states: diasrmed, armed home, armed away.

packages.name: Appliance Status
packages.description: Driver representing an appliance with 3 states: idle, running, finished.

packages.name: Occupancy Status
packages.description: Driver representing a room with 3 states: vacant, occupied, checking.

packages.name: Person Status
packages.description: Driver representing a person with 3 states: home, away, sleep.

packages.name: Virtual Alexa Button
packages.description: Driver for a button that additionally can be used as a sensor in Alexa routines.

packages.name: Virtual Alexa Switch
packages.description: Driver for a switch that additionally can be used as a sensor in Alexa routines.

packages.name: Ambient Weather Integration
packages.description: A simple api for providing ambient weather access

packages.description: Rachio Community Package

packages.name: Roomba Integration
packages.description: Connects to Roomba via Dorita
